chenfj068 commented on pull request #4074: ARROW-5049: [Python] org/apache/hadoop/fs/FileSystem class not found when pyarrow FileSystem used in spark
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4074
 
 
   ensure  hadoop-common*.jar in classpath 
   
   hdfs.py
   ```
   import re
   
   if re.match('.*/hadoop-common[^/]+.jar', os.environ.get('CLASSPATH', '')):
        return
   
   ```
